content: You depict perfectly the dichotomy between conformity to what the world expects of us verses trying to stay true to who we are, to stay authentic. I think a lot of our anxiety can come from this social pressure. In the end it’s better for our peace of mind to be authentic, but doing so in our ever watching and ever judging world can be difficult. We shouldn’t be ashamed to be authentic and it’s a shame that we are, given all the seemingly vacuous reassurances that we are in fact free to be ourselves. Thank you for sharing this Sheila. You write honestly and beautifully.
